extensions.name: ms-semantic-kernel.semantic-kernel
extensions.description: Prompt engineering tools to create AI plugins with Semantic Kernel

extensions.name: ms-windows-ai-studio.windows-ai-studio
extensions.description: AI Toolkit for Visual Studio Code simplifies generative AI app development by bringing together cutting-edge AI development tools and models from Azure AI Studio Catalog and other catalogs like Hugging Face.

extensions.name: prompt-flow.prompt-flow
extensions.description: Prompt flow is a suite of development tools designed to streamline the end-to-end development cycle of LLM-based AI applications, from ideation, prototyping, testing, evaluation to production deployment and monitoring. It makes prompt engineering much easier and enables you to build LLM apps with production quality.

extensions.name: ms-toolsai.prompty
extensions.description: Prompty is an asset class and format for LLM prompts designed to enhance observability, understandability, and portability for developers. The primary goal is to accelerate the developer inner loop.
